    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, Wizard wiz, Tower towerColor, int initialTowerCount, int initialCoins) throws IncorrectConstructorParametersException
      Constructs and sets up the player
      Parameters:
      nickname - (type String) nickname of player
      towerColor - (type Tower) type of player tower
      initialTowerCount - (type List of int) number of tower
      wiz - (type List of Wizard) chosen Wizards
      initialCoins - (type int) number of initial coins
      Throws:
      IncorrectConstructorParametersException - whenever the Parameters of the constructor aren't correct
